title: Fahrenheit to Celsius Conversion | Challenge
description: In many countries, temperature is measured in Celsius. However, in some countries, temperature is measured in Fahrenheit. It is important to be able to convert between these two units of measurement. In this challenge, you will write a function that converts Fahrenheit to Celsius.

meta.title: Fahrenheit to Celsius Conversion Challenge
meta.description: Learn how to write a function that converts Fahrenheit to Celsius temperature.
meta.keywords: python playground, python, celsius, fahrenheit, temperature conversion, programming challenge, coding tutorial

verify.name: Verify Fahrenheit to Celsius Conversion
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 华氏度到摄氏度的转换 | 挑战
i18n.description: 在许多国家，温度是以摄氏度为单位进行测量的。然而，在一些国家，温度是以华氏度为单位进行测量的。能够在这两种计量单位之间进行转换是很重要的。在这个挑战中，你将编写一个将华氏度转换为摄氏度的函数。

meta.title: 华氏度到摄氏度转换挑战
meta.description: 学习如何编写一个将华氏度转换为摄氏度的函数。
meta.keywords: Python 练习场, Python, 摄氏度, 华氏度, 温度转换, 编程挑战, 编码教程

steps.title: 华氏度到摄氏度的转换

verify.name: 验证华氏度到摄氏度的转换
verify.hint: 请确保你已完成所需操作。
